mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mulford's Widal Test Outfit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: H. K. Mulford Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This set contains items needed for conducting a Widal test to detect typhoid. The set includes: 30 c.c stock bottle Typhoid suspension, 30 c.c stock bottle salt solution, 10 c.c dropping flask used for dropping Typhoid Suspension, 10 c.c droping flask used for dropping salt solution, 6 graduated test tubes used in making tests, graduated pipette, 12 small capillary bulbs or tubes to collect the blood serum, needle. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
